name: JujuCMS
tagline: Java & Struts 2 based Content Management System by JujuApps
body:
### Welcome to JujuCMS
JujuCMS is a Java & Struts 2 and Tiles based Content Management System by JujuApps. It supports Custom Templates, Custom Struts 2 Action and gives you full control over the code-base of the underlying Content Management System. Unlike OpenCMS or other complex Content Management Systems, JujuCMS is much simpler, flexible and customizable.

### Authors and Contributors
JujuCMS is currently being developed by Prithwiraj Bose (@prithwirajbose). Prithwiraj is presently working as a Tech Lead in TATA Consultancy Services Ltd. He also works as a [Freelancer](https://www.freelancer.com/u/techbongo.html) and [Mobile App Developer](http://jujuapps.com).

### Support or Contact
This project is still in development phase. No code is yet released for Acceptance and Integration Testing. You can [contact Prithwiraj](http://sribasu.com), if you wish to join this project.
